title: La-doped MIL-88B(Fe)–NH2: a mixed-metal–organic framework photocatalyst for highly efficient reduction of Cr(VI) in an aqueous solution
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20543-20552
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03351E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Minh Hue Dang Thi, Linh Giang Hoang Thi, Chinh Dang Huynh, Hoai Phuong Nguyen Thi, Duc D. La
A novel method to fabricate La-doped MIL-88B(Fe)–NH2 mixed-metal–organic frameworks is reported. The prepared rare earth-doped MOFs show remarkable photocatalytic performance for the removal of Cr(VI) in aqueous media.
